game.name: The Saint
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Captions available, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Saint" is a first-person psychological horror set in eerie liminal spaces with VHS body cam visuals. Explore a decaying dreamworld, solve symbolic puzzles, and escape a nightmare inspired by the dread and mystery of Silent Hill.
